author: pgoldstein
msg: Large changes to the POP3Handler.java class
wrapping of logging calls in log level checks, conversion of
equalsIgnoreCase to equals, introduction of Locale.US to upper
For more detail please see messages on the james-dev mailing list

author: pgoldstein
msg: Part of the String=>StringBuffer changes.  Includes some additional
commenting, formatting fixes, and wrapping of logging calls in log
level checks.  Also converted equalsIgnoreCase paradigm as discussed on
mailing list.  Locale issue for both toUpperCase() and toLowerCase() was

author: pgoldstein
msg: Fix to the previous bugfix.  Removing extra leading '+'s

author: pgoldstein
msg: An bugfix to the Redirect mailet that addresses potential issues with
the subject prefix.  The mailet now contains instructions for configuring
the mailet for preserving whitespace in the prefix.
Thanks to Noel Bergman for this submission.

author: pgoldstein
msg: An enhancement to the RemoteAddrNotInNetwork and RemoteAddrInNetwork matchers
that allows them to take host names as well as IP addresses as parameter.
Thanks to Noel Bergman for this submission.
